channel.title: Russia Beyond on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Russia Beyond on Rusland 1

item.title: Russian New Year (Новый год) and the First Encounter
item.description: Begin = continuation Linked to New Year is a Russian saying (in the realm of superstition) that can sound both motivating and ominous. Как встретишь Новый год (How you begin/meet the New Year), так его и проведёшь (is how it will go).

item.title: Russian Matryoshka Yes
item.description: Matryoshka ≠ Babushka I get it, you’ll say, but not everyone understands or knows that. The matryoshka is often called a babushka – and really, it’s better to say nothing at all if you’re going to say that. Difficult for Mrs.

item.title: Clichés & Prejudices (About Russia & Russians)
item.description: Inventories below, sometimes with responses or rebuttals. Stereotypes about Russians | Learn Russian with movies (Hack Your Russian, 2020, 11 m) Street Interviews with Russians – Stereotypes About Russia (RussianPlus, 2019, 28 m) More about Russians than About Russia, but still relevant here.
